Text: Beware! The PirateBay trackers for this torrent are refusing connections. Don't count on getting any speed
farstanley, I downloaded the issue just fine. It took 5 minutes. Maybe your IP got banned because you're a leecher or your connection isn't configured right.

The issue is not formatted for CDisplay. To format it, put all the pictures in a zip file then change the extension of the zin file to "cbr". Simple. While you're at it remove the annoying extra pages advertising the scan team.
